CIRCULAR  25   / 2000 
 
 
SUB: MONITORING OF ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT 
 
 
It has been brought to the notice of this Bureau that due attention is not being given 
by the Airport Security Units to monitor the serviceability of security equipment like X-ray 
BIS / DFMD / HHMD.  As a result the electronic equipments are not maintained properly.  In 
this connection instructions issued by this Bureau vide Circular No.  CAS-6 (3) / 96 –Div –I 
dated 30.05.97 (Copy enclosed) are reiterated. 
 
2. 
It is further requested that the Airport Security Units may please be further advised to 
thoroughly check the performance of all the security equipments in every shift and inform 
AAI immediately for rectification of any defects, which shall be promptly rectified by AAI. 
 
3. 
Proper record on the format prescribed vide our Circular referred to above shall be 
maintained by the APSU and shall be produced to the inspecting Officer of BCAS during his 
inspection / visit to the airport. 
 
 
This issues with the approval of COS (CA). 
  
 
 (R.K SINGH) 
Addl Commissioner of Security (CA) 
for Commissioner of Security (CA)
